Internet Status Alarm - A simple internet "down-or-not" alert tool

What does it do?

This is simple webpage that checks whether your internet is working or not every 5 seconds. If in case your internet goes down, it notifies you with a sound message.

Why?

If you are downloading a very large file and currently on an unstable internet connection, you might want to be notified immediately once the internet is down so you can take check what's the problem. This basically saves you the frustration of coming back to your computer or phone 2 hours later only to realize your internet went down somewhere in the middle.

How to use?

  1. Please make sure your speakers are on.
  2. Press the start button and leave this page in the background. You will be notified if your internet goes down. You will also be notified once it is back up.
